title: 10-night Fly & Tour: Vietnam Express Southbound
inclusions_evidence: Economy class flights from Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, with Singapore Airlines
Accommodation: Hotel (7 nights), Overnight boat (1 night), Overnight sleeper train (1 night)

flights.assumed_route: Auckland to Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City

other.notes: Prices for meals and additional accommodations are estimated based on average costs.

reasoning: This deal offers significant savings compared to DIY options, especially with included flights and meals, making it a strong value.
additional_notes: The deal includes a comprehensive tour experience with various accommodations and meals.
